faq.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about plans, deliveries, and security

items.question: Do you offer a money-back guarantee?
items.answer: Yes. We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee — if you're not satisfied, we'll refund you in full.

items.question: What happens when my letter is delivered?
items.answer: On your scheduled delivery date, we'll send your letter via your chosen method (email or physical mail). Email letters arrive instantly, while physical letters are sent with tracking.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
items.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel at any time. You'll retain access until the end of your billing period, and any already-scheduled letters will still be delivered.

items.question: How secure are my letters?
items.answer: We use bank-level AES-256 encryption for all letter content. Your letters are encrypted before storage and only decrypted for delivery. Not even our team can read your letters.

items.question: What's the difference between digital delivery and physical mail?
items.answer: Digital delivery sends your letter to the recipient's inbox on the scheduled date. Physical mail prints your letter on premium paper and sends it to your address via trusted carriers.

items.question: Can I purchase extra deliveries?
items.answer: Yes. You can purchase additional digital or physical deliveries anytime, and use them when you schedule new letters.
